s0201.chinese: 楚騎來眾，漢王乃擇軍中可為（車）騎將者，皆推故秦騎士重泉人李必、駱甲習騎兵，今為校尉，可為騎將。
s0201.idiomatic: When Tai died, his son Han Fu succeeded him.

s0202.chinese: 漢王欲拜之，必、甲曰：「臣故秦民，恐軍不信臣，臣願得大王左右善騎者傅之。」
s0202.idiomatic: When Fu died, his son Han Fan succeeded him.

s0203.chinese: 灌嬰雖少，然數力戰，乃拜灌嬰為中大夫，令李必、駱甲為左右校尉，將郎中騎兵擊楚騎於滎陽東，大破之。
s0203.idiomatic: When Fan died, his son Han Yan succeeded him.

s0204.chinese: 受詔別擊楚軍後，絕其餉道，起陽武至襄邑。
s0204.idiomatic: When Yan died, his son Han Yi succeeded him.

s0205.chinese: 擊項羽之將項冠於魯下，破之，所將卒斬右司馬、騎將各一人。
s0205.idiomatic: When Yi died, his son Han Xin succeeded him.

s0206.chinese: 擊破柘公王武，軍於燕西，所將卒斬樓煩將五人，連尹一人。
s0206.idiomatic: When Xin died, his son Han Jie succeeded him.

s0207.chinese: 擊王武別將桓嬰白馬下，破之，所將卒斬都尉一人。
s0207.idiomatic: When Jie died, his son Han Lian succeeded him.

s0208.chinese: 以騎渡河南，送漢王到雒陽，使北迎相國韓信軍於邯鄲。
s0208.idiomatic: When Lian died, his son Han Guang succeeded him.

s0209.chinese: 還至敖倉，嬰遷為御史大夫。
s0209.idiomatic: When Guang died, his son Han Kai succeeded him.

s0210.chinese: 三年，以列侯食邑杜平鄉。
s0210.idiomatic: When Kai died, his son Han Sheng succeeded him.

s0211.chinese: 以御史大夫受詔將郎中騎兵東屬相國韓信，擊破齊軍於歷下，所將卒虜車騎將軍華毋傷及將吏四十六人。
s0211.idiomatic: When Sheng died, his son Han Xin succeeded him.

s0212.chinese: 降下臨菑，得齊守相田光。
s0212.idiomatic: When Xin died, his son Han Rong succeeded him.

s0213.chinese: 追齊相田橫至嬴、博，破其騎，所將卒斬騎將一人，生得騎將四人。
s0213.idiomatic: When Rong died, his son Han Qiang succeeded him.

s0214.chinese: 攻下嬴、博，破齊將軍田吸於千乘，所將卒斬吸。
s0214.idiomatic: When Qiang died, his son Han Zhuang succeeded him.

s0215.chinese: 東從韓信攻龍且、留公旋於高密，卒斬龍且，生得右司馬、連尹各一人，樓煩將十人，身生得亞將周蘭。
s0215.idiomatic: When Zhuang died, his son Han Hong succeeded him.

s0216.chinese: 齊地已定，韓信自立為齊王，使嬰別將擊楚將公杲於魯北，破之。
s0216.idiomatic: When Hong died, his son Han Sheng succeeded him.

s0217.chinese: 轉南，破薛郡長，身虜騎將一人。
s0217.idiomatic: When Sheng died, his son Han Wei succeeded him.

s0218.chinese: 攻（博）［傅］陽，前至下相以東南僮、取慮、徐。
s0218.idiomatic: When Wei died, his son Han Tao succeeded him.

s0219.chinese: 度淮，盡降其城邑，至廣陵。
s0219.idiomatic: When Tao died, his son Han Jun succeeded him.

s0220.chinese: 項羽使項聲、薛公、郯公復定淮北。
s0220.idiomatic: When Jun died, his son Han Ji succeeded him.

s0221.chinese: 嬰度淮北，擊破項聲、郯公下邳，斬薛公，下下邳，擊破楚騎於平陽，遂降彭城，虜柱國項佗，降留、薛、沛、酂、蕭、相。
s0221.idiomatic: When Ji died, his son Han Quan succeeded him.

s0222.idiomatic: When Quan died, his son Han Xun succeeded him.

s0223.idiomatic: When Xun died, his son Han Bo succeeded him.

s0224.chinese: 從擊項籍軍於陳下，破之，所將卒斬樓煩將二人，虜騎將八人。
s0224.idiomatic: When Bo died, his son Han Zhuang succeeded him.

s0225.idiomatic: When Zhuang died, his son Han Jie succeeded him.

s0226.chinese: 項籍敗垓下去也，嬰以御史大夫受詔將車騎別追項籍至東城，破之。
s0226.idiomatic: When Jie died, his son Han Yong succeeded him.

s0227.chinese: 所將卒五人共斬項籍，皆賜爵列侯。
s0227.idiomatic: When Yong died, his son Han Guang succeeded him.

s0228.chinese: 降左右司馬各一人，卒萬二千人，盡得其軍將吏。
s0228.idiomatic: When Guang died, his son Han Chen succeeded him.

s0229.idiomatic: When Chen died, his son Han Yan succeeded him.

s0230.chinese: 渡江，破吳郡長吳下，得吳守，遂定吳、豫章、會稽郡。
s0230.idiomatic: When Yan died, his son Han Tao succeeded him.

s0231.idiomatic: When Tao died, his son Han Quan succeeded him.

s0232.chinese: 漢王立為皇帝，賜益嬰邑三千戶。
s0232.idiomatic: When Quan died, his son Han Xin succeeded him.

s0233.chinese: 其秋，以車騎將軍從擊破燕王臧荼。
s0233.idiomatic: When Xin died, his son Han Rong succeeded him.

s0234.idiomatic: When Rong died, his son Han Xiang succeeded him.

s0235.chinese: 還，剖符，世世勿絕，食潁陰二千五百戶，號曰潁陰侯。
s0235.idiomatic: When Xiang died, his son Han Jie succeeded him.

s0236.chinese: 以車騎將軍從擊反韓王信於代，至馬邑，受詔別降樓煩以北六縣，斬代左相，破胡騎於武泉北。
s0236.idiomatic: When Jie died, his son Han Yong succeeded him.

s0237.chinese: 復從擊韓信胡騎晉陽下，所將卒斬胡白題將一人。
s0237.idiomatic: When Yong died, his son Han Guang succeeded him.

s0238.chinese: 受詔并將燕、趙、齊、梁、楚車騎，擊破胡騎於硰石。
s0238.idiomatic: When Guang died, his son Han Chen succeeded him.

s0239.chinese: 至平城，為胡所圍，從還軍東垣。
s0239.idiomatic: When Chen died, his son Han Yan succeeded him.

s0240.chinese: 從擊陳豨，受詔別攻豨丞相侯敞軍曲逆下，破之，卒斬敞及特將五人。
s0240.idiomatic: When Yan died, his son Han Tao succeeded him.

s0241.chinese: 降曲逆、盧奴、上曲陽、安國、安平。
s0241.idiomatic: When Tao died, his son Han Quan succeeded him.

s0242.idiomatic: When Quan died, his son Han Xin succeeded him.

s0243.chinese: 黥布反，以車騎將軍先出，攻布別將於相，破之，斬亞將樓煩將三人。
s0243.idiomatic: When Xin died, his son Han Rong succeeded him.

s0244.chinese: 又進擊破布上柱國軍及大司馬軍。
s0244.idiomatic: When Rong died, his son Han Xiang succeeded him.

s0245.idiomatic: When Xiang died, his son Han Jie succeeded him.

s0246.chinese: 嬰身生得左司馬一人，所將卒斬其小將十人，追北至淮上。
s0246.idiomatic: When Jie died, his son Han Yong succeeded him.

s0247.idiomatic: When Yong died, his son Han Guang succeeded him.

s0248.chinese: 布已破，高帝歸，定令嬰食穎陰五千戶，除前所食邑。
s0248.idiomatic: When Guang died, his son Han Chen succeeded him.

s0249.chinese: 凡從得二千石二人，別破軍十六，降城四十六，定國一，郡二，縣五十二，得將軍二人，柱國、相國各一人，二千石十人。
s0249.idiomatic: When Chen died, his son Han Yan succeeded him.

s0250.chinese: 嬰自破布歸，高帝崩，嬰以列侯事孝惠帝及呂太后。
s0250.idiomatic: When Yan died, his son Han Tao succeeded him.

s0251.chinese: 太后崩，呂祿等以趙王自置為將軍，軍長安，為亂。
s0251.idiomatic: When Tao died, his son Han Quan succeeded him.

s0252.chinese: 齊哀王聞之，舉兵西，且入誅不當為王者。
s0252.idiomatic: When Xin died, his son Han Xin succeeded him.

s0253.chinese: 上將軍呂祿等聞之，乃遣嬰為大將，將軍往擊之。
s0253.idiomatic: When Xin died, his son Han Rong succeeded him.

s0254.chinese: 嬰行至滎陽，乃與絳侯等謀，因屯兵滎陽，風齊王以誅呂氏事，齊兵止不前。
s0254.idiomatic: When Rong died, his son Han Xiang succeeded him.

s0255.chinese: 絳侯等既誅諸呂，齊王罷兵歸，嬰亦罷兵自滎陽歸，與絳侯、陳平共立代王為孝文皇帝。
s0255.idiomatic: When Xiang died, his son Han Jie succeeded him.

s0256.chinese: 孝文皇帝於是益封嬰三千戶，賜黃金千斤，拜為太尉。
s0256.idiomatic: When Jie died, his son Han Yong succeeded him.

s0257.chinese: 三歲，絳侯勃免相就國，嬰為丞相，罷太尉官。
s0257.idiomatic: When Yong died, his son Han Guang succeeded him.

s0258.chinese: 是歲，匈奴大入北地、上郡，令丞相嬰將騎八萬五千往擊匈奴。
s0258.idiomatic: When Guang died, his son Han Chen succeeded him.

s0259.chinese: 匈奴去，濟北王反，詔乃罷嬰之兵。
s0259.idiomatic: When Chen died, his son Han Yan succeeded him.

s0260.chinese: 後歲餘，嬰以丞相卒，謚曰懿侯。
s0260.idiomatic: When Yan died, his son Han Tao succeeded him.

s0261.idiomatic: When Tao died, his son Han Quan succeeded him.

s0262.idiomatic: When Xin died, his son Han Xin succeeded him.

s0263.idiomatic: When Xin died, his son Han Rong succeeded him.

s0264.chinese: 元光三年，天子封灌嬰孫賢為臨汝侯，續灌氏後，八歲，坐行賕有罪，國除。
s0264.idiomatic: When Rong died, his son Han Xiang succeeded him.

s0265.chinese: 太史公曰：吾適豐沛，問其遺老，觀故蕭、曹、樊噲、滕公之家，及其素，異哉所聞！
s0265.idiomatic: When Xiang died, his son Han Jie succeeded him.

s0266.chinese: 方其鼓刀屠狗賣繒之時，豈自知附驥之尾，垂名漢廷，德流子孫哉？
s0266.idiomatic: When Jie died, his son Han Yong succeeded him.

s0267.chinese: 余與他廣通，為言高祖功臣之興時若此云。
s0267.idiomatic: When Yong died, his son Han Guang succeeded him.
